title: Cloudflare API Shield - Audit
description: This dashboard provides a unified view of audit activity in Cloudflare API Shield, delivering insight into configuration changes in endpoints, schema management, and associated security actions.

definition.content:
[CloudFlare API Shield](https://www.cloudflare.com/en-in/application-services/products/api-shield/) is a comprehensive solution designed to protect, manage, and monitor Application Programming Interfaces (APIs) against various security threats and operational challenges.

This dashboard provides a unified view of audit activity in Cloudflare API Shield, delivering insight into configuration changes in endpoints, schema management, and associated security actions.

For more information, see the [CloudFlare API Shield Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/cloudflare_api_shield/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.

definition.title: Top IPs Interacting with Created/Deleted Endpoints

query.query_string: source:cloudflare-api-shield service:audit-logs @resource.type:operations @action.type:(create OR update OR delete) $client_ip $zone_name $user_email $action_type $actor_type
